name: SAKTHI FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Sakthi Foundation : We understand that this truth reflects throughout human history in all arts sciences and in all walks of life and in all human thoughts and action. We see that there is unity (Universal) in thought and also understand the cause for variations.Activities of Sakthi Foundations:1.First free or pay-as-capable Sakthi Montessori school in a village called Sendurai, Tamil Nadu, India. The school is running in a rental place with four teachers and two helpers currently.Currently 25 children ranging from 1 to 5 years of age areenrolled. 2.Supporting children with physical disabilities by donating wheelchair and other needs.3.Organized several “vision camps”, in remote villages of Tamil Nadu,India With the help of ARVIND EYE
